CHK.name: Chequing Lite
CHK.notes: Waives monthly maintenance only at a low monthly cost.

CHK.name: Chequing Plus
CHK.notes: Waives monthly maintenance and paper statements; halves overdraft fee.

CHK.name: Chequing Premier
CHK.notes: Waives maintenance, paper, outgoing wires, FX fees; overdraft fee waived.

SAV.name: Savings Essentials
SAV.notes: Waives excess withdrawal and inactivity fees at a budget price.

SAV.name: Savings Plus
SAV.notes: Waives excess withdrawal and inactivity; ATM fee waived at network ATMs.
